patthana1.17:1.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:2.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā,
patthana1.17:2.1_1: tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:3.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:4.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:5.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:6.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:7.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:8.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:9.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:10.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:11.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:12.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:13.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:14.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:15.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:16.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:17.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:18.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … adhipatipaccayā … anantarapaccayā … samanantarapaccayā … sahajātapaccayā … aññamaññapaccayā … nissayapaccayā … upanissayapaccayā … purejātapaccayā … āsevanapaccayā … kammapaccayā … āhārapaccayā … indriyapaccayā … jhānapaccayā … maggapaccayā … sampayuttapaccayā … vippayuttapaccayā … atthipaccayā … natthipaccayā … vigatapaccayā … avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.17:19.1_1: ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:21.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:22.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:23.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:24.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:25.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukādhipati.
patthana1.17:26.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:27.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_1: Maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:29.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:30.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:31.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:32.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:33.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:34.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:35.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:36.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:37.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:38.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:39.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā … napacchājātapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇā dvepi.)
patthana1.17:40.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:41.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:42.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:43.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:44.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:45.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:46.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:47.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:48.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:49.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.17:50.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:51.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:52.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.17:53.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:54.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:55.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā. (Pañca pañhā.)
patthana1.17:56.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā. (Paṭhamaghaṭane tīṇi.)
patthana1.17:57.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā. (Dutiyaghaṭane tīṇi pañhā.)
patthana1.17:58.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ.)
patthana1.17:59.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:60.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ, arūpanti niyāmetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:61.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke sattarasa, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:63.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa,
patthana1.17:65.1_1: samanantare ekaṁ …pe… jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:68.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:69.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:70.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:71.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:72.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:73.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:74.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:75.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:76.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:77.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.17:77.1_2: maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa,
patthana1.17:78.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:79.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:80.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:81.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:83.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:85.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:85.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:86.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:86.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:87.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:87.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:88.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:88.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:89.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:90.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:90.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:91.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:91.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:91.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:92.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:92.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggāhetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:93.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:94.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:95.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:95.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:96.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:96.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:97.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:97.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:98.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:98.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:98.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:99.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:99.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:100.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:100.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:101.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:102.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:103.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:103.1_1: Āvajjanā maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:104.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:105.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:106.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:107.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:108.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:109.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:110.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… (anantarasadisaṁ) sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana1.17:111.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.17:112.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.17:113.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.17:114.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:114.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:115.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:115.1_1: **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:116.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….

patthana1.17:127.1_1: **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.

patthana1.17:128.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:129.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.17:129.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:130.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:130.1_1: **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:131.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:131.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:132.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:133.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ. Nava pañhā kātabbā, āvajjanā na kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:134.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā …pe…. (Nānākkhaṇikā natthi, sattarasa pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:135.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo (ime satta paccayā sattarasa pañhā hetusadisā) … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisā) … avigatapaccayena paccayo. (Sattarasa pañhā.)
patthana1.17:136.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa,
patthana1.17:136.1_1: āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:138.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:139.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:140.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:141.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:142.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:143.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:144.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:145.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:146.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:148.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:149.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:150.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:151.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:152.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:153.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:154.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:155.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:156.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:157.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:158.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:159.1_1: naārammaṇe sattarasa (naārammaṇe gahite pakatārammaṇampi upanissayārammaṇampi dvepi chijjanti), naadhipatiyā ekavīsa,
patthana1.17:159.1_2: naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate ekavīsa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:161.1_1: naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:163.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa,
patthana1.17:163.1_1: indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
